name: Trading Signals Policy
author: Newton
description:
This policy gives trading signals for tokens so that trades only are allowed when they meet the below preset conditions:
•
Contract whitelist: Only allows transactions with approved contracts
•
Function restrictions: Restricts allowed trading functions (buy, sell)
•
Amount limits: Enforces maximum trade amount in USDC
•
Market conditions: Token must have had upward price movement over the last 6 months
•
Market cap requirements: Only allows trading tokens with market cap rank ≤ 200
